snippet: The Golden Palominos backed up the folky singer-songwriters Lianne Smith and Lori Carson at Le Poisson Rouge on Saturday, after a superb opening set by the band Ida.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews Golden Palominos concert at Le Poisson Rouge.
lead_paragraph: The Golden Palominos backed up the folky singer-songwriters Lianne Smith and Lori Carson at Le Poisson Rouge on Saturday, after a superb opening set by the band Ida.

headline.seo: Golden Palominos, With Lianne Smith and Lori Carson
headline.main: The More Things Change, the More a Band Can Do
headline.print_headline: The More Things Change, The More a Band Can Do
